storing a set of communications event records defining a plurality of communications event workspace items, said plurality of communications event workspace items each comprising data relating to a different communications event;

detecting a correspondence between at least one characteristic of a communications event workspace item stored in said set of communications event records and at least one characteristic of a calendar workspace item stored in said set of calendar records;
processing data relating to the communications event on the basis of the detected correspondence;

receiving user input to select a calendar workspace item; and in response to said user input, providing information relating to the calendar workspace item and corresponding communication event records on the basis of the detected correspondence.
21. A method according to claim 20, comprising:
filtering said plurality of communications event workspace items on the basis of the detected correspondence; and
generating a filtered set of at least one communications event in response to said filtering.
22. A method according to claim 21 , comprising:
receiving first user input selecting said calendar workspace item; and
in response to receiving said user input, displaying at least one of said filtered set of communications events.
23. A method according to claim 22, comprising:
receiving second user input selecting one of said displayed events; and
initiating a new communications event on the basis of said selected event.
24. A method according to claim 23, wherein detecting a correspondence comprises:

detecting a correspondence between at least one characteristic of a communications event workspace item and at least one characteristic of said calendar workspace item if a time characteristic of said communications event workspace item corresponds with a time characteristic of said calendar workspace item.
25. A method according to any of claim 20 to claim 24, comprising:
storing a set of contact management records defining a plurality of contact management workspace items, and wherein detecting a correspondence comprises:

detecting a correspondence between at least one characteristic of a communications event workspace item and at least one characteristic of a contact management workspace item, and between at least one characteristic of said contact management workspace item and at least one characteristic of said calendar workspace item.
26. A method according to any of claim 20 to claim 25, wherein said communications event is a telephone call for which said telephone number identifies a party to the telephone call.
27. A computer program which, when executed on a computerized device, causes the computerized device to perform a method for processing data relating to communications events, the method comprising:
storing a set of calendar records defining a plurality of calendar workspace items;

storing a set of communications event records defining a plurality of communications event workspace items, said plurality of communications event workspace items each comprising data relating to a different communications event;

detecting a correspondence between at least one characteristic of a communications event workspace item stored in said set of communications event records and at least one characteristic of a calendar workspace item stored in said set of calendar records;

processing data relating to the communications event on the basis of the detected correspondence; receiving user input to select a calendar workspace item; and in response to said user input, providing information relating to the calendar workspace item and corresponding communication event records on the basis of the detected correspondence.
28. A telephony device for processing data relating to a communications event, wherein the device is arranged to:
store a set of calendar records defining a plurality of calendar workspace items;

store a set of communications event records defining a plurality of communications event workspace items, said plurality of communications event workspace items each comprising data relating to a different communications event;

detect a correspondence between at least one characteristic of a communications event workspace item stored in said set of communications event records and at least one characteristic of a calendar workspace item stored in said set of calendar records;
process data relating to the communications event on the basis of the detected correspondence;

receiving user input to select a calendar workspace item; and in response to said user input, providing information relating to the calendar workspace item and corresponding communication event records on the basis of the detected correspondence.
